questions.question: What is the main purpose of a software requirement specification (SRS) document?

options.A: To outline the software design and architecture
options.B: To provide a detailed description of the software requirements
options.C: To define the software testing strategy
options.D: To describe the user interface design

questions.question: Which of the following describes a situation where a software system is designed to operate in various environments?
Which development model involves regular adjustments and iterations based on user feedback?
What is the role of a software configuration management (SCM) system?

options.A: To track and manage changes to software code
options.B: To automate the software build process
options.D: To manage user access and permissions

questions.question: Which software development practice emphasizes writing tests before coding?
In software engineering, what is the purpose of a Gantt chart?

options.A: To represent the project's critical path
options.B: To show the flow of data in a system
options.C: To visualize project tasks and their timelines
options.D: To model the relationships between objects in an object-oriented system

questions.question: Which metric measures the extent to which a software system can be modified without introducing errors?
What does 'KLOC' stand for in the context of software metrics?

options.B: Kilobytes of Logical Operations and Code

questions.question: In software risk management, what is the term for a risk that has occurred and requires immediate action to mitigate its impact?
Which software quality management principle focuses on the need for a systematic approach to achieving an organization's quality objectives?
Which modeling technique in software engineering focuses on visualizing the interactions between different components of a system?
Which software testing technique assesses the system's ability to recover from failures and errors gracefully?
What is the primary goal of the Capability Maturity Model (CMM)?

options.A: To assess an organization's capability to perform software development

questions.question: In software engineering, which metric measures the amount of time it takes to execute a program or a specific task within the program?
What is the main purpose of a Software Configuration Management (SCM) system?

options.B: To track changes to the software and documentation

questions.question: In software project risk management, what is the term for risks that are unknown or unpredictable?
Which of the following is NOT a characteristic of a well-defined software requirement?
Which software development process model is known for its focus on documentation and strict phase gates?
In software quality management, what does 'QA' stand for?
Which software testing technique involves examining the internal structure of the software, including the code and algorithms?
